Name: team_has_scrum_master
Description: A team must have exactly one Scrum Master assigned.

Name: user_story_has_tasks
Description: Every User Story in a sprint must be broken down into at least one task.

Name: sprint_goal_defined
Description: Every sprint must have a defined sprint goal.

Name: worker_availability
Description: No worker can be assigned more tasks than their availability permits.

Name: project_budget
Description: The total cost of a project must not exceed its allocated budget.

Name: task_blocked
IsSum: high-severity blocker can be in an 'In Progress' status.

Name: sprint_length
Description: A sprint's length (end_date - start_date) must be exactly 2 weeks.

Name: definition_of_done
Description: Every task must meet the team's 'Definition of Done' to be marked complete.

Name: product_owner_backlog
Description: The Product Backlog must be managed by exactly one Product Owner.

Name: retrospective_actions
Description: At least one improvement action must result from each sprint retrospective.

Name: feature_priority
Description: Features with 'Critical' priority must be completed before lower-priority ones.
